rules_text:
Whenever this creature dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Whenever this creature is sacrificed, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

OG_1:
Whenever CB02 MV2 Willing Fodder dies, each opponent loses 2 life.
Whenever CB02 MV2 Willing Fodder is sacrificed, you may have each player discard a card.
